Posts.Content: That feeling when you wake up from the few hours of sleep at night and for a split second you think it's all been a dream and then the sledgehammer hits you is an awful feeling. Then you say to yourself YOU ARE STRONG AND IT WILL NOT BEAT ME  Many rivers to cross and I'll probably sink a little along the way but i will not drown (Sorry for the rant but i had to get that out)
Posts.Title: That Morning Sledgehammer

Posts.Content: Hi bubalugs My scalp is really hurting too I'm inbetween 1/2 of my chemo and the tenderness is really bad and waking me up . I'm glad your mum feels better and not so uncomfortable and a big hug for you for shaving your head too people who do that for cancer patients are amazing  I wish your my luck and loads of love and hugs Xx
Posts.Title: very tender scalp due too chemo...suggestions?

Posts.Content: Hi guys I'm inbetween 1/2 chemo sessions due to have my 2nd next Friday. My hair is very loose right now and losing if I simply touch my head although it feels like it falls out if I just LOOK at it!  I was embracing this part of the treatment up until NOW - now its happening and its hit me and it don't make it feel better that I have got pain on my scalp too and the headaches are literally waking me up It's so emotional I did cut all my hair into a pixie cut to make the pain ease off and the pain is getting worse. I'm not ready to shave it just yet.  In anybody else experience with this how long does the pain last for is it the entire time that the hair falls out?
Posts.Title: Scalp pain and impending hair loss

Posts.Content: Hi LondonLass, I totally agree with you i was diagnosed 3 days ago and you never know when the emotions hit you it's still very very early for me and i have a tough journey ahead of me  You just have to allow the tears to flow X
